detail.description: I am a final-year undergraduate student in <major>Computer Science</major> at <university>Sebelas Maret University</university>. I have completed several internships as a <role>Software Engineer</role>, including at <meiwa>Meiwa Industry Co., Ltd</meiwa>. So, you could say I have professional coding experience for {years} years.
detail.fullArsenal: Check out all the skills I have!
detail.technologyDescription: Here are some of the technologies I frequently use, they’ve become like my daily companions.

tooltip.meiwa: Finally, I got to experience living in Japan! For me, this is a dream come true, especially as a student with a modest budget

skillList.note: Some micro-frameworks may not be included

sc.role1: Participated in intensive training in backend development using Python and the Django framework. This training covered efficient backend development techniques and best practices for using Django.
sc.role2: Developed an API-based backend system that can be integrated with the UI provided by Startup Campus. After completing this training, I received a certificate as proof of participation and achievement.

meiwa.role1: Developed an internal website to monitor factory operations and facilitate employee access to information. The website was designed to unify various company applications that previously had different layouts and links, creating a more consistent and efficient user experience.
meiwa.role2: Created core UI components such as input forms, buttons, tabs, and more using <primevue>PrimeVue</primevue> (UI Framework). These components ensure consistent design across the entire website, maintaining uniformity in both appearance and functionality.
meiwa.role3: Developed a feature to monitor the status of production items that are in the painting process.
meiwa.role4: Developed an FMEA (Failure Mode and Effects Analysis) feature to identify and prevent potential failures or defects in the production process. This feature helps ensure high product quality and minimize the risk of errors.

risnov.role1: Rebuilt the website using the Laravel framework to meet the latest requirements, including updating the PHP version used.
risnov.role2: Built a homepage that showcases previews of the latest articles, along with a dedicated page for reading the full articles.
risnov.role3: Displayed <rida>RIDA</rida> (Research and Innovation in Data) data with visualizations in the form of charts.

main.description: Since 2022, I started my first internship to hone my skills and gain experience. Although it's been relatively short, I am very grateful to the companies that have provided opportunities for growth. This experience has been invaluable and provides a strong foundation for my career journey.
Check out some of the projects I’ve worked on during freelancing, company projects, and case studies.

descriptions.meiwaPortal: An internal website to monitor factory operations and facilitate employee access to information. Developed using Vue.js and Laravel, along with several additional libraries.

technologyList.note: Some micro-frameworks may not be included

GetInTouch.goodBye: Even though I’m a bit introverted, I'll respond to messages as long as my social energy lasts. Coding, work, movies, or even anime-related topics are all good. So, feel free to reach out to me on social media or send me an <email>email</email>.

Sidebar.me: I’m a software engineer specializing in backend APIs and frontend integration. Recently, I’ve also been diving into UI/UX and React with great enthusiasm.
Sidebar.nickname: But you can call me Babas or Nao. It’s more fun that way . . .
Sidebar.thanks: Hi! I’m really glad you visited my personal site, <thank>thank you!</thank>
